title: Chocolate Baked Alaska
ingredients: ['For the Chocolate Sponge Base', '2 large eggs', '50g caster sugar', '40g plain flour', '2 1/2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', 'For the Chocolate Meringue', '3 large egg whites', '150g caster sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', 'For the Filling', '1 litre high-quality chocolate ice cream']
